local_intent: Transport the grasped cloth edge to the fold line pose and confirm arrival.
assumptions: fold_line_pose is a valid and reachable target
Cloth remains securely grasped during transport
coherence_with_global: Matches transfer phase of GLOBAL_BT: after yaw and lift, move to fold_line_pose and verify position while ensuring the cloth is still grasped and yaw is 90.
